name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: These jeans are very warm . I have worn them to work all winter. However they stretch a bit after wearing & then the colour washes out a bit too. However that doesn’t matter where I work

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Fantastic jeans except for the quality of the fly zip. Zip fell apart after the first wash. Very, very disappointing.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: It’s real denim with fleece lining. It’s definitely thicker than regular jeans but prefer the fleece to be thicker. Warm but could be warmer.It’s advertised as skinny fit but it’s slim fit in my opinion.Overall I’m satisfied with the product as it still keeps me warm in cold weather.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I bought these to keep me warm and they really do.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: They weren't jeans that I received they are leggings/tights spandex ...

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Fit is not perfect but pretty good. Best part is it’s so warm!

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: These jeans are so thick they’re like cement. Hurts to bend your knees. They are not comfortable. I hate them. They have a short fly so it looks like I have a long V. So ugly. Feels like you’re walking around in cardboard jeans.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Got these for a trip to the mountains and wasn’t disappointed. Very comfy and warm, but not to the point of overheating. The fit is great, was a little nervous when the wash instructions said not to tumble dry but they didn’t shrink at all.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Amei, pedi no tamanho 40 e deu certinho, ótimo material, me vestiu super bem e a pelucia por dentro é bem quentinha e macia. super recomendo.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 January 2020

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I love the thickness of the material and how warm it keeps my legs here in the Northwest area in the middle of winter. However, the size M was way to small I could not get my legs in. So I returned that one and went for the next size. I am petite, so the waiste line is perfect, my legs went in fine, but it’s too long and too much material on theLegs part of the pant. I keep Ed it anyway as I felt in love with the fact that it keeps me warm.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 February 2024

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: The inside lining is so soft  Made with quality material. The sizing is a little off, size up. I purchased the thinner flannel lined jeans as well as the thicker fleece lined.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I wear a size 12-14 petite in most pants. I went by the reviews and I ordered a xxl. They fit baggy. They are a good two inches too long but with the taper of the pants and wearing boots they stay up. They are super warm. The lining is fleece and is attached to the stretch denim. I got black and it is super warm and super thick. I regular wash and dryer dried them a couple times and they came out as good as new. I’m looking forward to ordering more in different colours and I’m keeping the ones that are too big.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: It's the most comfy pair of pants I ever had. And keeps me nice and warm, and because it's not clinging onto my skin, the way leggings do, it's easy to add a thermal wear inside (or 2) when the temperature drops to -19 or has real feel temps of -26.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 15 November 2022

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I LOVE these cozy warm slim stretchy leggings!!!  I feel like I searched hard for lined stretch leggings, and these are all I found.  They are affordable, yay!  My only wish is that there was more attention paid to the details like stitching, and zipper quality.  I am 5'7", 106 pounds, and ordered the extra small.  I sometimes need a small, but these are plenty big.  They keep me as warm as jeans worn together with medium-weight long underwear.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Nice and warm, runs a little small
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 February 2024

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: La tela es como los jeans normales y por dentro el forro es muy suave, no muy grueso por lo que no es incómodo al usarlo. Súper calientitos. Calzan Perfecto y se amoldan bien al cuerpo. Los súper recomiendo
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 4 January 2020

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: These jeggings are great! Lined with thick fleece and very warm. They ran long on me but I am only 5'1". They will be tucked in boots anyway. Stretchy and comfortable. Outside is like denim.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 February 2024

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: These are great! I will be ordering more! 5’2 130 pounds great length, love that they are high rise.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Endlich mal eine gefütterte Hose, die lang genug ist.Ich bin 1,71m und wiege 61 kg. Die Größe S passt wie angegossen. Schön schwarz. Der Bund ist auch gerade richtig-nicht zu niedrig und nicht zu hoch. Perfekt. Wird meine neue Lieblingshose :)))Ich hoffe die Farbe bleibt nach dem Waschen auch so schön schwarz
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 20 December 2019

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Comfy and durable
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 23 December 2021

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Love the quality, I bough in 2 colors, fits perfect

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I love these jeans. They are so warm and cozy. I don’t buy  pants online because I need to try things on. I took a chance and bought them. They look so nice and I have gotten so many compliments on them. I’m all about warm and cozy so these pants are perfect for the person that’s likes to be warm. I’m 5,5 and 125lbs and the small fits the best. Will be ordering more. I wish they came in a lighter Jean color though.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: These pants shredded apart the first time I wore them.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: The pants are awesome. It's nice to feel warm and cozy for a change, and they're good for cold winter days and even chilly autumn days.I am 5'5'' and got a small and it fits well.However, The rubber against my belly bugs me, and when I try to lower it to make it more comfortable, it create a bulge on the front side of the pants. It's hard to get used to not doing it, because high rise pants are so rare that they no longer feel comfortable. As a result I have to keep reminding myself not to adjust them throughout the day. But hey - I am warm, and they have deep pockets (+5 points). The sherpa is nice and thick, and it fits well.If I could ask for another version - it would have longer legs and shorter rise. Then it would be an ultimate go-to-without-thinking pants.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 November 2023

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Omg these are so warm totally reccomend.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 5 November 2022

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Do not fit and not flexible
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2023

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Tolle Jeans für kalte Tage. Der hohe Bund betont nicht nur die Taille, er hält auch den Rücken super warm. Ich mag das Teil.Die Passform ist super, nur die Hosenbeine zu lang. Ich habe dieses Problem öfter bei Jeans bei meiner Körpergröße
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 December 2019

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Hello from Alaska, these are very warm, the style quality is eh (no detail) and the color is what really gives it away as not being real Jean or good quality.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 3 February 2020

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: These stretch jeans are a great buy! They fit perfectly and the pockets are even fleece lined as well. What I really like is the fleece is perfect not to have a not too light. Very well made and fits to your figure. Highly recommend!

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Love the fit except they are not midrise but high waisted. Still love everything except the rise. Do keep you warm here in NH. And the fact I found them in xs is surly a plus❤️
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 20 November 2022

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I liked everything about them! The right look , size and the right price 😊! Just as advertised.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: These fur-lined pants are perfect for both cold winter days and air-conditioned office buildings. Unfortunately I fall between 2 sizes: small is a nice fir in the legs but the waist area is too tight. Medium is comfortable around the waist but the legs are more loose in the legs than I’d like. Even with this complaint, I still bought 3 pairs of them.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I’m short wasted so these ‘bunch up’ in the crotch area. Also 3” too long.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 December 2022

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I love the way it feels against my skin very warm as expected. I wear them to work.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 23 February 2024

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Me encantó la tela. Flexibilidad y es exactamente un pantalon muy calientito exacto como se describe pedí una talla mas grande pero si viene en su talla correctaz no es necesario pedir mas grande. Me encantó!  Pediré otro.

reviews: Passt super, bequem, elastisch, warm. Eine kleine Niete hat sich gleich zu Beginn gelöst, was mich aber nicht sonderlich stört.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Bien, peut être prendre une grandeur au dessus.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: They fit everywhere but around the front. There is so much extra fabric, these are perfect for pregnant women.

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Espectacular  para invierno

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: So eine Hose habe ich lange gesucht. Fühlt sich klasse an
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 January 2020

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: My husband and I love to travel in January or February- there are less people and most places are much cheaper since it’s off-season. The issue for me has always been my lower body. I can bundle up with a warm coat, scarf, beanie, and warm boots, but my jeans or leggings would always make my lower body freeze on a day out sightseeing. I’ve tried several kinds of long underwear but they always ride up and make me uncomfortable.Enter these jeans! They are very comfortable and stretchy, but most importantly- they are super warm! I’m also short, and I’m so glad they offer short sizes- they were the perfect length! I tested them out while looking at Christmas lights and they were awesome. I can now truly look forward to our Boston trip in January!

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: This is exactly as it is in description. Love them and would definitely order again

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: The product came with junk (rock pebbles...) in the pocket.  Yuck
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 December 2023

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: Happy to have found jeans to get through the cold season.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 6 December 2022

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: I order a lot online and (almost) never had such a crappy product!  Pants are too big and way too short!  They do not fit at all.  Also never got pants with a button hole that you have to open up yourself.I sent a picture of the unfit pants to sellers customer service as they requested; still no refund.  They wrote me back that I looked good in them, lol.I should have read more reviews; I do not understand how they can have 4*
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 November 2021

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
reviews: El unico detalle es que siento que el botón no esta bien sujeto

name: heipeiwa Womens Winter Jeans Thick Skinny Pants Fleece Lined Slim Stretch Warm Jeggings
